titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Fruit of dreams [videorecording] / written, produced, and directed by William Jamerson ; associate producer, Diana Pena.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Fruit of dreams [videorecording] / written, produced, and directed by William Jamerson ; associate producer, Diana Pena.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Traverse City, MI : Forgotten Films & Video, c1995.

odd.head: Varying Form of Title
odd.p: Subtitle on container: Mexican cherry pickers of Traverse City.

odd.head: Creation/Production Credits
odd.p: Narrator, Hector Valdez ; editor, Scott Adam Vanderschel ; videographers, Dallas Bond ... [et al.].

archdesc.scopecontent: Chronicles the experience of Mexican farmworkers in the Traverse City, Michigan area from the 1920s to the 1970s.
